author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four people were arrested on Saturday by the police for attacking a duo and damaging a Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTC) Bus on Broadway on Friday night.

According to the police, Anand, a resident of Kannagi Nagar was not on good terms with relative Anjalai, a flower-vendor at Broadway, and often quarrelled with her.

On Friday, at Kannagi Nagar, a quarrel broke out between Anand and Anjalai and in a fit of rage, Anand fiercely attacked Anjalai, and fled the scene.

Anjalai, her husband Raja and his friend Chandru filed a complaint against Anand regarding the attack at the Kannagi Nagar police station.

On learning that a complaint had been filed against him, Anand attempted to take revenge against the trio, with the help of a few men.

On finding Raja and Chandru at Broadway, Anand and his men attacked the duo. In the fight, route number 27B (CMBT – Anna Square) bus got damaged.

Raja and Chandru have been admitted, and are undergoing treatment at Rajiv Gandhi Government General Hospital, Park Town.

The Broadway and Esplanade Police Stations have booked cases against Anand and his henchmen for damaging public property and attacking the duo respectively.
title: Four held for attacking duo
